{{Infobox Network Adapter |image1 = WLE600-V5-27-2.png |image1_size = 150px |caption = High Power Wireless miniPCIe adapter |caption2 = 802.11ac 5GHz 2T2R 867Mbps |pp = http://www.compex.com.sg/product/wle600v5-27/ |sp = |dl = |wikidevi = Compex_WLE600V5-27 |wikipedia = |brand = Compex |model = WLE600V5 |submodelappend = |submodel = -27-ESD |revision = |subrevision = |model_part_num = |page_start_date = 11/03/2014 |page_start_origon = https://wikidevi.com/wiki/Compex_WLE600V5-27 |sernum = |wlclass = AC867 |series = |if = Mini PCIe |if_bus_version = 1.1 |ifconnector = |formfactor = |vendor_id = |device_id = |subvendor_id = |subdevice_id = |id_string = |windosid = |fcc_id = TK4WLE600V5-27 |icid = |boardid = |ecc_id = |oui = |chip1 = Qualcomm Atheros;QCA9882;QCA9882 v2; |chip2 = |chip3 = |chip4 = |antconn = MMCX |txchains = 2 |rxchains = 2 |sstreams = 2 |wirelessstand = IEEE 802.11a/n/ac |802.11ac = 867 |nqam = |802.11n = 300 |802.11a = 54 |wififreq = 5 |receive_sens = |transmit_power = |linuxdriv = |windriv = |is_manuf = No |manuf = Compex |manuf_model = WLE600V5-27-ESD 8AB000 |manuf_rev = v1.0 |addchip = |flags = |802dot11_protocols = an+ac |accessible_UART = No |accessible_JTAG = |category = |availability = |eoldate = |fccapprovdate = 10/09/2014 |estreldate = 10/30/2014 |price = |upc = 782606775383 |ean = |dx_sku = |newegg = |asin = |asin_country = |asin2 = |asin_country2 = |country = China |powledcolor = |connactled = |spdledcolor = |leddupcolor = |dimmin = |weight = }}{{TIDTOC|adapter}} ==Overview== {{CompexMailKimp}} ===Product Key Feature=== *Qualcomm Atheros QCA9882 *5GHz max 27dBm output power (per chain) , 30dBm(aggregate) *IEEE 802.11ac compliant & backward compatible with 802.11a/n *2x2 MIMO Technology, up to 867Mbps *Built-in ESD Protection with ESD/EMP Immunity Threshold: 15KeV1 *MiniPCI Express 1.1 interface *Supports Spatial Multiplexing, Cyclic Delay Diversity (CDD), Low-Density Parity-Check (LDPC) Codes, Maximal Ratio Combining (MRC), Space Time Block Code (STBC) *Supports IEEE 802.11d, e, h, i, k, r, v time stamp, and w standards *Supports Dynamic Frequency Selection (DFS) *Cards are individually calibrated for Quality Assurance *Supported by either CompexWRT with Atheros Reference Wireless Driver OR OpenWRT with ath10k Wireless Driver on WPJ344 === Ordering Configuration === 
Item Code 	 	Chipset 	Card Information
WLE600V5-27 8AB000 ESD 	QCA9882 	2x2 11ac 5GHz High Power miniPCIe Radio
==Links of Interest== ===Purchase Sample=== [http://shop.compex.com.sg/wle600v5-27.html Compex System Sample Store] ==Pictures==
